cxmlTemplate:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<cXML payloadID="{{PAYLOAD_ID}}" timestamp="{{TIMESTAMP}}">
  <Header>
    <From>
      <Credential domain="NetworkID">
        <Identity>{{BUYER_ID}}</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </From>
    <To>
      <Credential domain="NetworkID">
        <Identity>supplier-acme-dev</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </To>
    <Sender>
      <Credential domain="NetworkID">
        <Identity>{{DOMAIN}}</Identity>
        <SharedSecret>acme-dev-secret</SharedSecret>
      </Credential>
      <UserAgent>Acme PunchOut Client 2.0</UserAgent>
    </Sender>
  </Header>
  <Request>
    <PunchOutSetupRequest operation="create">
      <BuyerCookie>{{SESSION_KEY}}</BuyerCookie>
      <Extrinsic name="User">developer@waters.com</Extrinsic>
      <Extrinsic name="Environment">dev</Extrinsic>
      <Extrinsic name="CustomerName">{{CUSTOMER_NAME}}</Extrinsic>
      <Extrinsic name="DepartmentCode">IT-DEV</Extrinsic>
      <BrowserFormPost>
        <URL>https://dev.{{DOMAIN}}/punchout/return</URL>
      </BrowserFormPost>
      <Contact role="buyer">
        <Name xml:lang="en">Acme Developer</Name>
        <Email>dev@acme.com</Email>
      </Contact>
    </PunchOutSetupRequest>
  </Request>
</cXML>

cxmlTemplate:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<cXML payloadID="{{PAYLOAD_ID}}" timestamp="{{TIMESTAMP}}" xml:lang="en-US">
  <Header>
    <From>
      <Credential domain="AribaNetworkUserId">
        <Identity>{{BUYER_ID}}</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </From>
    <To>
      <Credential domain="AribaNetworkUserId">
        <Identity>supplier-techcorp</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </To>
    <Sender>
      <Credential domain="AribaNetworkUserId">
        <Identity>{{DOMAIN}}</Identity>
        <SharedSecret>techcorp-dev-2024</SharedSecret>
      </Credential>
      <UserAgent>TechCorp Procurement Portal</UserAgent>
    </Sender>
  </Header>
  <Request>
    <PunchOutSetupRequest operation="create">
      <BuyerCookie>{{SESSION_KEY}}</BuyerCookie>
      <Extrinsic name="UniqueName">techcorp-dev-user</Extrinsic>
      <Extrinsic name="UserEmail">dev@techcorp.com</Extrinsic>
      <Extrinsic name="CompanyCode">TC001</Extrinsic>
      <BrowserFormPost>
        <URL>https://dev-portal.{{DOMAIN}}/cart/process</URL>
      </BrowserFormPost>
      <Contact role="endUser">
        <Name xml:lang="en">TechCorp Developer</Name>
        <Email>dev@techcorp.com</Email>
        <Phone name="work">+1-555-0100</Phone>
      </Contact>
    </PunchOutSetupRequest>
  </Request>
</cXML>
description: Development template for TechCorp with Ariba integration

      </BrowserFormPost>
      <Contact role="buyer">
        <Name xml:lang="en">Innovation Procurement</Name>
        <Email>procurement@innovationlabs.com</Email>
      </Contact>
    </PunchOutSetupRequest>
  </Request>
</cXML>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<cXML payloadID="{{PAYLOAD_ID}}" timestamp="{{TIMESTAMP}}">
  <Header>
    <From>
      <Credential domain="NetworkID">
        <Identity>{{BUYER_ID}}</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </From>
    <To>
      <Credential domain="NetworkID">
        <Identity>supplier-innovation-s4</Identity>
      </Credential>
    </To>
    <Sender>
      <Credential domain="NetworkID">
        <Identity>{{DOMAIN}}</Identity>
        <SharedSecret>innovation-s4-dev</SharedSecret>
      </Credential>
      <UserAgent>Innovation S4 Integration</UserAgent>
    </Sender>
  </Header>
  <Request>
    <PunchOutSetupRequest operation="create">
      <BuyerCookie>{{SESSION_KEY}}</BuyerCookie>
      <Extrinsic name="SAPSystem">INNO-S4-DEV</Extrinsic>
      <Extrinsic name="Lab">R&D-S4-DEV</Extrinsic>
      <BrowserFormPost>
        <URL>https://s4-dev-lab.{{DOMAIN}}/punchout/return</URL>
      </BrowserFormPost>
      <Contact role="buyer">
        <Name xml:lang="en">Innovation S4 Developer</Name>
        <Email>s4dev@innovationlabs.com</Email>
      </Contact>
    </PunchOutSetupRequest>
  </Request>
</cXML>
description: S4 Development template for Innovation Labs
